description: Specifies how a module is deployed and undeployed
title: LaunchDescriptor

___cmdlineStop.description: Process stop instruction where the idea is that shell or process spawned thereof stops service

___cmdlineStart.description: Process start instruction where the idea is that shell or process spawned thereof goes into background on its own. The string is passed to Bourne shell (Unix Only) and %p is replaced with the assigned port

___exec.description: Process execution with string passed to exec and %p is replaced with assigned port

___waitIterations.description: Number of iterations that Okapi waits for module to be fully ready

___dockerArgs.description: Create Container JSON object passed to create container call for Docker. See https://docs.docker.com/engine/api/v1.37/#operation/ContainerCreate

___dockerImage.description: Deploy using Docker container and string is Docker image
